General.Name: Solborn Inc
General.Description: Solborn, Inc. engages in the manufacturing and sales of medical equipment in South Korea. It engages in the PACS and S/W manufacturing, sales, and maintenance; medical device H/W manufacturing, wholesale, and maintenance; and provision of newspaper issuance and online information services. It also invests in small and medium-sized enterprises and venture companies. The company was formerly known as Serome Technology, Inc. Solborn, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
